game.name: Glory Survivor
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Glory Survivor is a roguelike where you choose a gladiator with unique traits. Survive waves in the arena, unlock god powers, summon creatures, and combine abilities. Every game is different; every death is glorious.
